name: ROLLER (itch) (Cifpnr)
description:
This was a game made for a student project. The game was developed by me and Hugo Moreira at https://itch.io/profile/hmoreira

The controls are pressing "A" and "D" to move sideways and tapping "Space" to jump.

Music:

TimeTamer by BETTOGH

Chromatic by SynthKid

Smooth Sailing by DOS-88

Corrupt by Grim Nights
